DOC.brief_title: Ideal Depth Guide Wire Central Catheterization
DOC.detailed_description: Total 69 ASA ( American Society Anesthesiologist ) physical status class I II patient enrol . Randomly assign three group accord depth guide-wire prior tissue dilation central catheterization via right internal jugular vein . ( Group 1 : 15 cm / Group 2 : 17.5 cm / Group 3 : 20 cm ) Central catheterization perform anesthesiologist blind study protocol . An investigator monitor record whether arrhythmia occur . The incidence occurrence arrhythmia compare three group .
DOC.criteria: patient receive general anesthesia require central venous catheterization via right internal jugular vein .
